item.title: 1000 Subscribers!
item.author: Kamil
item.description: Iâ€™ve just passed 1000 subscribers on my #YouTube channel - thank you! https://lnkd.in/e6mBpUZA Back in 2020 I have started a little experiment and since then it has been slowly growing and growing. I wanted to share my knowledge and experience with like-minded IT professionals. I wanted to create a community where people could come to learn more about #powershell and how to become modern #sysadmin, while being free to ask any questions on the topic!
